titleStmt.title: The present state of the universe, or, An account of I. The rise, births, names, matches, children, and near allies of all the present chief princes of the world, II. Their coats of arms, motto's, devises, liveries, religions, and languages, III. The names of their chief towns, with some computation of the houses and inhabitants ... IV. Their revenues to which are added some other curious remarks, as also an account of common-wealths, relating to the foregoing heads.
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, John, d. 1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Randall Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by J. Beaumont. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
